WPFTemplate.​Helpers.​ChangeNotifier
public
NetSparkleUpdater.​UI.​WPF.​ViewModels.​UpdateAvailableWindowViewModel

View model for views that detail updates that are available for a given user

Functions
UpdateAvailableWindowViewModel
public UpdateAvailableWindowViewModel()

Initialize the view model with release notes, remind me later, and skip button being visible by default.

Properties
ReleaseNotesUpdater
public IReleaseNotesUpdater ReleaseNotesUpdater { get; set }

Interface object for the object that will be displaying the release notes

UserRespondedHandler
public IUserRespondedToUpdateCheck UserRespondedHandler { get; set }

Interface object for the object that can handle user responses to the update that is being shown to the user

TitleHeaderText
public string TitleHeaderText { get; set }

Header text to show to the user. Usually something along the lines of "A new version of {software} is available!"

InfoText
public string InfoText { get; set }

Some additional text to show to the user underneath the header. This is text like "Version {version} is now available. Do you want to download it?"

IsRemindMeLaterEnabled
public bool IsRemindMeLaterEnabled { get; set }

Whether or not the "Remind Me Later" button is enabled

IsSkipEnabled
public bool IsSkipEnabled { get; set }

Whether or not the "Skip this Update" button is enabled

Updates
public List<AppCastItem> Updates { get }

The list of updates that are available for downloading by the user

AreReleaseNotesVisible
public bool AreReleaseNotesVisible { get; set }

Whether or not the release notes for updates are shown to the user

IsRemindMeLaterVisible
public bool IsRemindMeLaterVisible { get; set }

Whether or not the "Remind Me Later" button is visible

IsSkipVisible
public bool IsSkipVisible { get; set }

Whether or not the "Skip this Update" button is visible

UserResponse
public UpdateAvailableResult UserResponse { get }

The response that the user gave to the update

Skip
public ICommand Skip { get }

Command to execute when the user wants to skip this update

RemindMeLater
public ICommand RemindMeLater { get }

Command to execute when the user wants to be reminded about this update later

DownloadInstall
public ICommand DownloadInstall { get }

Command to execute when the user wants to download and install the update right away

Functions
PerformSkip
public void PerformSkip()

Skip updating the software

PerformRemindMeLater
public void PerformRemindMeLater()

Hide the update window and show it to the user at another time

PerformDownloadInstall
public void PerformDownloadInstall()

Start downloading the update so that the user can install it

private void SendResponse(
UpdateAvailableResult response
)

public void Initialize(
SparkleUpdater sparkle,
List<AppCastItem> items,
bool isUpdateAlreadyDownloaded = false,
string separatorTemplate = "",
string headAddition = ""
)

Initialize this view model with its necessary items so that it can display things to the user properly

Parameters
sparkle
SparkleUpdater

The  item that is currently checking for updates

items
List<AppCastItem>

The list of  updates that are available for the user

isUpdateAlreadyDownloaded
bool

Whether or not the update is already downloaded ot the user's computer

separatorTemplate
string

The HTML string template to show in the release notes

headAddition
string

The HTML string to add into the head element of the HTML for the release notes

Cancel the download of release notes or other asynchronous operations taking place
